name: compact
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: consisting of parts that are positioned together closely or in a tidy way, using very little space

example.eg: What a compact office! How did you fit so much into so little space?
example.egtrans: 多么小的办公室！你们是如何把这么多东西塞进这么小的空间的？

name: compact
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: compact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a small, flat case that contains women's face powder
trans_examp.trans_cn: （装女性扑面用香粉的）带镜粉盒

dsense.name: compact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: compact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a formal agreement between two or more people, organizations, or countries

example.eg: They made a compact not to reveal any details.
example.egtrans: 他们互相约定不透露任何细节。

name: compact
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to press something together in a tight and solid way

example.eg: Cars had compacted the snow until it was like ice.
example.egtrans: 汽车把雪碾得越来越实，直到变得像冰一样。
